Description: type in search bar and choose a result from the suggested matches dropdown
type in search bar and choose a result from the suggested matches dropdown. Suggestion comes from previous search history.

Fires any time a search page loads, including after these actions:
- enter search from search bar
- change page number of search results
- change search filter (in checkboxes on left or to include community results or filter result type)
- user returns to search page
filter search - click on one of the filter checkboxes on the left side of search page
filter search - choose something in the dropdown for result type at top of search page

click on search result card/box (inside the box but not a link within the card). Also fires when:
- bookmark/unbookmark a search result (but do not actually view it)
- follow an account search result (but do not actually view it)
- click on linked dataset/file/table within a dataset/project search result card
click on search result title
click on search result title

Description: click bookmark button in search result. Fires when bookmarking and unbookmarking. Also fires when the user bookmark/unbookmarks from the dataset or project page.
click follow button in search result. Does not include unfollows.

click to view file
